title: LickiMat Classic Soother, Dog Feeding Mat for Boredom and Anxiety Relief, Ideal for Food, Treats, Yoghurt or Peanut Butter, Lick Mats, Fun Alternative to a Slow Feeder Bowl, Pink

features: DOG BOREDOM BREAKER: LickiMat is the original dog boredom breaker, our slow feeder dog bowl alternative helps calm and soothe your pet by helping release endorphins through the promotion of licking. This dog licking mat is a safe alternative for your dog to lick. Our dog feeding mat is a great for stressful times such vet visits, bath time, nail clipping, injury recovery as well as thunderstorms and fireworks. Great in combination with dog puzzle feeders and dog sniffing mats

RECOMMENDED BY VETS AND TRAINERS: Redirect all licking habits and perfect aid to reduce crate training time. Works with all manner of treats and foods, ranging from yoghurt, dog peanut butter and spreadable treats, dog and puppy raw and wet food, dry and liquid foods, allowing your pet to enjoy just a small amount of food. These lick mats for dogs and puppies are a perfect delivery system for supplements, medications and dog treats. Perfect for crate training. Slow feeder for dogs

DENTAL HEALTH: The lickimat's soother's textured surfaces promote pleasurable licking action, which generates saliva helping protect your pet’s teeth and gums. Scrapes food particles and odor-causing bacteria off your pet’s tongue, promoting healthier teeth, gums and fresher breath. The original licking mat/feeding mat for dogs

SERVE NATURAL DOG TREATS: Serve runny foods like yoghurt, bone broth, gravy, baby food, fruit/vegetables blended to liquid, add our low calorie dog treat - lickimat sprinkles. Food settles in the mat’s surface which slows the feeding dramatically and prolongs enjoyment. Less calories, healthier treats and longer duration

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY AND SAFE: No silicone. This slow feed licking mat is not a dog chew toy. Please supervise your pet. If you have a puppy or known chewer, please order a lickimat tuff, it is very strong, freezer friendly, microwave safe and easy to handwash. The original lick mat for dogs! Makes a great gift for dogs (dog birthday present or dog christmas present) or gift for dog lovers
